subject: Football
lead_paragraph: For whatever supposedly better players the yet-to-be-named Giants general manager acquires, Coach Tom Coughlin needs two or three locker-room pillars whom he can trust and who trust him.
snippet: For whatever supposedly better players the yet-to-be-named Giants general manager acquires, Coach Tom Coughlin needs two or three locker-room pillars whom he can trust and who trust him.
